# EpochPeriod.Overlaps method

Indicates whether both epoc periods are overlapses.

```csharp
public bool Overlaps(EpochPeriod anotherPeriod)
```

| parameter | description |
| --- | --- |
| anotherPeriod | Another epoc period. |

## Return Value

true if is overlap; Otherwise, false.
